Why'd you move all the way to another planet's SOI? It's generally accepted that unless stated otherwise, a battle stays in and around the planet the battle is over's (in this case, Pol) SOI.

Would you kindly fix your ships so that they're not on the other side of the Jool system?
I enjoyed the post of the ship that was stripped of it's armour and showed the insides so here's the Victory Mk-IV without armour.

I enjoyed the post of the ship that was stripped of it's armour and showed the insides so here's the Victory Mk-IV without armour.

http://i.imgur.com/xU4DowM.png

what's her tonnage normally?
110 I think... Let me just load the game...

110 I think... Let me just load the game...

wow, impressive! That's a lot of SRBs it carries....

Yep, 111 tons.

She carries 8, firing two at a time. I decided not to arm her with I-beams because they're made of more parts but have less destructive power than the SRBs she carries.

Yep, 111 tons.

She carries 8, firing two at a time. I decided not to arm her with I-beams because they're made of more parts but have less destructive power than the SRBs she carries.

oh yeah i have never really liked .5 missiles.
They're good for little fighters but for capital ships they just don't have enough power to be of any use against another capital ship.

They're good for little fighters but for capital ships they just don't have enough power to be of any use against another capital ship.

aye I feel like i need to make a new Drek based off of the XIV-XII, but with lighter (or more fuel efficient) missiles.

Hey everyone! I know this isn't quite on topic but i think you all will like it!

NEW BATTLE SERIES!

I want to announce a new KSP series which is zokesia-related... it's going to be using the ships from here, or ones you guys can send me. I'm almost done with the first episode, and I have a trailer done right now.....

I like it, but I wish I could make cinematics too:(

Edited November 9, 2014 by Megalodon 720

Hey everyone! I know this isn't quite on topic but i think you all will like it!

NEW BATTLE SERIES!

I want to announce a new KSP series which is zokesia-related... it's going to be using the ships from here, or ones you guys can send me. I'm almost done with the first episode, and I have a trailer done right now.....

Is this going to be canon with Hatbats Keithane Station or its own story?

Is this going to be canon with Hatbats Keithane Station or its own story?

It is its own story; basically Zokesia (which is going to be on Duna/Ike) is invaded by KRAKEN, a company made my my friend.... You guys can add ships though, we need them! I'm putting Zokesia at a huge disadvantage in teh beginning, we have like 100 tonne ships fighting his 200+ battlecruisers, and we're outnumbered 2 to 1 in most cases.

It's not going to be as awesome cinematic wize, but it's going to be real- the combat is real, the damage is real (although every once and a while i'll use whack a kerbal for explosions).... and unlike his which is mostly narrative and setup, mine is going to by focused on the combat, the action- that's what I want to see in a KSP combat Vid, and I'm sure others do too.... raw fighting, debris, explosions, splintered ships.....

Would Zokesia like to borrow a new Victory class? I can send you the download tonight if you'd like to.

Also, I really would like it if it turned into a proper Macey Dean style series, completely stock and with completely unedited battles.

Would Zokesia like to borrow a new Victory class? I can send you the download tonight if you'd like to.

Also, I really would like it if it turned into a proper Macey Dean style series, completely stock and with completely unedited battles.

oh yes, sure! I love the shape of that thing. I can easily work you into my series.

Also, it is all stock, but not unedited; I do that to keep it exciting, and I prefer cinematics to narration... but I'm new to this, I can experiment. I'll figure something out. I gained 8 subscribers in a day yesterday, from 6, so I'm feeling really good about this

It is its own story; basically Zokesia (which is going to be on Duna/Ike) is invaded by KRAKEN, a company made my my friend.... You guys can add ships though, we need them! I'm putting Zokesia at a huge disadvantage in teh beginning, we have like 100 tonne ships fighting his 200+ battlecruisers, and we're outnumbered 2 to 1 in most cases.

It's not going to be as awesome cinematic wize, but it's going to be real- the combat is real, the damage is real (although every once and a while i'll use whack a kerbal for explosions).... and unlike his which is mostly narrative and setup, mine is going to by focused on the combat, the action- that's what I want to see in a KSP combat Vid, and I'm sure others do too.... raw fighting, debris, explosions, splintered ships.....

...debris crashing into other ships

^Don't do this, too much Gravity.

I'd love to see this. Care to use any of my ships?
